name: Dirty Wars: September 11 (itch)
description:
Buy and wishlist on Steam: Here Dive into the fringes of the Cold War and revive the resistance to one of the most cruel dictatorships in Latin America.  A resistance in an oppressive closed world where resources are limited and information is more important than weapons.

On September 11, 1973, a bloody civic-military dictatorship begins in Chile after the overthrow of the democratically elected president: Salvador Allende.

Maximiliano and Abigaíl, a young couple decide to stay in Chile to join the resistance against the dictatorship, beginning a clandestine life in which they must face multiple challenges and sacrifices.

A story that combines stealth challenges, puzzles, and interactive dialogues.
